explains: n. 效率低；无效率；无能

sentences.en: The report drew a grim picture of inefficiency and corruption.
sentences.cn: 这份报告描绘了一幅办事效率低下和贪污腐化的可怕景象。

sentences.en: The report revealed a great deal of bureaucratic inefficiency.
sentences.cn: 报道大量揭示了官僚体制的无能。

sentences.en: The inefficiency of the distribution system has led to the loss of millions of tons of food.
sentences.cn: 分送系统的低效已经造成了数百万吨食物的损失。
